<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
    class="in-text"
    xml:lang="en"
    version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id></id>
    <title></title>
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>

    <citation>
        <layout suffix=".">
            <text variable="title" quotes="true" suffix=", "/>
            <text variable="container-title" strip-periods="true"/>
        </layout>
    </citation>
</style>
